purpose: Provide an open-source go-to-market (GTM) solution tailored for developer tools, focusing on lead generation and sales qualification.
principle: Built using Python, leveraging CRM and sales processes to streamline outbound marketing and lead qualification.
reusability: Offers APIs for integration with existing CRM systems, modular design for extending functionality, and Docker support for easy deployment.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential bugs, primarily focused on developer tools market.
name: chapter
description: Chapter: Open Source GTM for Developer Tools.
